title: Dear Old Dad
description:
On July 30th, Kevin's father passed away. On this week's episode, while Kevin is back home in Ohio, we look back at some of our favorite stories about fathers, with RISK!'s business director, JC Cassis, hosting.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (The Dukes of Dixieland, Peter Gabriel, Colleen Hindsley, Ernest Anfin, The Winstons, Shen Wei, Kevin Allison, Ings, JC Cassis)
